features: Fight Bad Breath: Our Fresh Breath Oral Rinse is a dentist-formulated mouthwash that targets sulfur-producing bacteria to help Fight Bad Breath. Clinically proven to be effective for over 12 hours
Restore Confidence: Our original Mild Mint mouthwash uses clinically-proven ingredients to help fight the bacteria that cause bad breath odor and stop sour, bitter, and metallic tastes in your mouth

Premium Oral Care: Our solution-oriented line of toothpastes, mouthwashes, breath sprays, tonsil stone kits, pet care products, and more can help your whole family get the oral hygiene support you need
Professional-Grade Products: TheraBreath's line of dentist-formulated toothpastes, mouthwashes, and other products are designed to help address halitosis, cavity prevention, gum disease, and more
Trusted Quality: Started in 1994 by dentist Dr. Harold Katz, TheraBreath has continued to innovate, delivering an extensive line of the highest-quality oral care products for you and your family
body.description: Praised for its ability to attack and eliminate embarrassing breath odor, the patented TheraBreath formula in Fresh Breath Oral Rinse uses the power of oxygen to target bad-breath-causing bacteria deep below the surface of the tongue and at the back of the throat. This refreshing, alcohol-free antibacterial rinse doesn't burn or sting, so it’s easy to use every day. TheraBreath Mild Mint Oral Rinse is certified kosher, gluten-free and vegan. It is also free of dyes, perfumes, detergents, and other harsh additives that can dry or damage the mouth. TheraBreath Fresh Breath Oral Rinse is our flagship product and has been dentist- and pharmacist-recommended for more than 20 years. TheraBreath Fresh Breath Oral Rinse is an ADA approved product and has become one of the United States' best-selling specialty oral hygiene treatments.Fresh Breath Oral Rinse by Dr. Katz attacks sulfur-producing bacteria, morning breath, and food odor. In fact, clinical studies have verified that TheraBreath is extremely effective at attacking bad breath odor for over 12 hours. This powerful mouthwash eliminates even the most severe cases of bad breath or halitosis (which is the scientific name for this condition). Dr. Katz’s proven oral rinse formula does not contain alcohol, artificial flavors, or colors. It is also pH-balanced to maintain a non-acidic environment in the mouth, which reduces burning and enamel erosion while preventing tooth sensitivity. This product is safe to use twice daily and is available without a prescription.This product is sold as a pack of six 3-ounce bottles and is available in a Mild Mint flavor that is easy on sensitive teeth and gums. As with all our products, TheraBreath Fresh Breath Oral Rinse is guaranteed to work to your satisfaction or your money back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this size because u can keep in the car a purse

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does work and it’s not like hydrogen peroxide
reviews.reviewText: I am really self conscious of my breath smelling as I have struggled with tonsil stones my whole life.Disclaimer: I have used peroxide in the past and it does help but it tastes awful and foams up and in my experience it helps you for a short period of time like an hour after rinsing. I read a review saying that this tastes like peroxide and it does not.You know when you close your mouth and open your glottis a little bit and you feel like a bitterness in the back of your throat (where your tonsils are) and you know that means you have stinky breath, well I have to really almost swallow mouthwash to get rid of that, and it only lasts for a short amount of time, sometimes I feel the stink’s still there but the smell of the mouthwash masks it.Well I tried this mouthwash: gone. It didn’t go away right away, I rinsed twice the first day, then before bed, then in the morning and midday I noticed that bitterness in the back of my throat was gone. Like it doesn’t come back. I hope this helps longterm but I know it’s working throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very difficult to open
reviews.reviewText: The product is just ok. I wouldn’t go tell my friends and family this will cure them, but if you don’t like the alcohol contained in other brands, this is a good choice. But the most annoying thing is how horrible it is to try to open the mouthwash. There’s no perforation and you’re just hoping to cut the plastic. It’s really bad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have tried a variety of their products and they all seem to work well

reviews.reviewText: We got the bottles intact and clean. The taste is very mild so its good for use and does not leave a bad aftertaste to it.Breath feels fresh!Recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love it!! However too expensive for the size. My opinion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Takes too much at a time
reviews.reviewText: I love the gum, just pop one in and my mouth feels refreshed. I used to use a liquid from Aveda with was a couple drops in your mouth no need to spit but apparently they no longer sell it. Since the TheraBreath gum worked so well I thought I'd try this. Unfortunately, for proper use the directions say 3 tablespoons. While that is for 24 hours you only get about 3 days worth in each bottle. That makes this very expensive and not a practical option. I have been using a capful right before I meet with someone which does help. I still use the gum but looking for a small bottle of some mouth refresher.
